title: STAT+: Eli Lilly’s obesity pill helped patients maintain weight loss after switch from injections
description: Eli Lilly's obesity pill helped patients maintain weight loss after they switched from injectable drugs, outcomes that could widen the appeal of the pill.
content: Eli Lilly's obesity pill helped patients maintain weight loss after they switched from injectable drugs, outcomes that could widen the appeal of the pill.
